definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The hydroxyapatite-coated prosthesis helped to reduce stress difference at bone and prosthesis interface.
sentences.chinese: 羥磷灰石表面塗層假體能緩和界面層的應力差異。

sentences.english: Conclusion Hydroxyapatite artificial eye base is one kind of comparatively ideal material for eye socket implantation.
sentences.chinese: 結論羥基磷灰石義眼座是眼窩填充術的較理想材料。

sentences.english: Studies of these minerals show they are hypergene minerals formed from weathering of apatite.
sentences.chinese: 研究認爲它們是磷灰石風化作用形成的表生礦物。

sentences.english: The results show that the obtained flower-like crystals are carbonated hydroxyapatite.
sentences.chinese: 測試結果表明得到的花狀結晶爲碳酸羥基磷灰石。

sentences.english: Conclusions The hydroxyapatite complex is the ideal filling material.
sentences.chinese: 結論羥基磷灰石複合體是較爲理想的充填材料。

sentences.english: Patients of the experimental group were filled with chc.
sentences.chinese: 實驗組患者充填碳酸化羥基磷灰石水泥。

sentences.english: Hydroxyapatite (HA) was commonly used as medical bioceramic materials.
sentences.chinese: 羥基磷灰石常用作醫用生物陶瓷材料。

sentences.english: Methods Granule hydroxyapatite artificial bone dust was applied to perform operation of projecting forehead and nose.
sentences.chinese: 方法應用顆粒狀羥基磷灰石人工骨粉進行隆額隆鼻術。

sentences.english: To investigate the influence of Sr2+ on the cytotoxicity of strontium substituted hydroxyapatite(Sr-HA).
sentences.chinese: 探討摻鍶對羥磷灰石細胞毒性的影響。

sentences.english: The main material of the phosphate fertilizer is apatite.
sentences.chinese: 這種磷肥的主要原料就是磷灰石。

sentences.english: Objective To improve modeling different complex forms ability of pure hydroxyapatite.
sentences.chinese: 目的彌補單純羥磷灰石不易塑造各種複雜形狀的缺陷。

sentences.english: Nano-apatite crystals was made from hydrothermal treatment.
sentences.chinese: 用水熱合成法制備了納米磷灰石晶體。

sentences.english: A kind of bacillus has shown significant ability to decompose apatite.
sentences.chinese: 確認了一種芽孢桿菌具有顯著的分解磷灰石的能力。

sentences.english: Manufacturing the screws out of the hydroxyapatite composite also simplifies production.
sentences.chinese: 製造羥基磷灰石複合螺釘可以簡化生產。

sentences.english: Objective To study the solubilities of two modified hydroxyapatites.
sentences.chinese: 目的兩種改性羥磷灰石生物陶瓷離解度的研究。

definition: orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)
rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
